entry.title: Hexo on GitHub
entry.content: Preparation GitHub: Register New repo: FireCuckoo.github.io Install Git,Node.js Use Git Bash Settings for GitHub12345678cd c:cd Users/FireCuckoomkdir MyGitcd Mygitgit initgit config --global user.name "FireCuckoo"git config --global user.email "FireCuckoo@gmail.com"ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "FireCuckoo@gmail.com" add C:\Users\FireCuckoo.ssh\id_rsa.pub to GitHub Settings for hexo1234567cd /c/Users/FireCuckoo/mkdir hexocd hexonpm install hexo-cli -ghexo inithexo ghexo s open URL: http://localhost:4000 open ~/hexo/_config.yml Ctrl F Search “deploy” 1234deploy: type: git repository: git@github.com:FireCuckoo/FireCuckoo.github.io.git branch: master Git bash: 12npm install hexo-deployer-git --savehexo d visit http://theme-next.iissnan.com/ to use next theme more features hexo/source/CNAME > FireCuckoo.com FireCuckoo:CNAME WWW FireCuckoo.github.io Get ip1ping FireCuckoo.github.io add record to DNS A @ ip ```
